Version 0.3.2
Voyager New Moves
Name Type Category PP Power Accuracy Description
Ice Punch 15 75 100 An icy punch that may cause frostbite.
Mist 30 0 Creates a mist that stops reduction of abilities.
Ice Beam 10 90 100 Blasts the foe with an icy beam that may cause frostbite.
Blizzard 5 110 70 Hits the foe with an icy storm that may cause frostbite.
Aurora Beam 20 65 100 Fires a rainbow-colored beam that may lower Attack.
Haze 30 0 Creates a black haze that eliminates all stat changes.
Powder Snow 25 40 100 Blasts the foe with a snowy gust. May cause frostbite.
Icy Wind 15 55 95 A chilling attack that lowers the foe's Speed.
Hail 10 0 Summons a hailstorm that strikes every turn.
Ice Ball 20 30 90 A 5-turn attack that gains power on successive hits.
Sheer Cold 5 1 30 A chilling attack that causes fainting if it hits.
Icicle Spear 30 25 100 Attacks the foe by firing 2 to 5 icicles in a row.
Avalanche 10 60 100 An attack that gains power if injured by the foe.
Ice Shard 30 40 100 Hurls a chunk of ice that always strike first.
Ice Fang 15 65 95 May cause flinching or leave the foe frozen.
Frost Breath 10 60 90 This attack always results in a critical hit.
Glaciate 10 65 95 Blows very cold air at the foe. It lowers their Speed.
Freeze Shock 5 140 90 A powerful 2-turn move that may paralyze the foe.
Ice Burn 5 140 90 A powerful 2-turn move that may inflict a burn.
Icicle Crash 10 85 90 Drops large icicles on the foe. May cause flinching.
Freeze-Dry 20 70 100 Super effective on Water- types. May cause frostbite.
Ice Hammer 10 100 90 Swings the fist to strike. Lowers the user's Speed.
Aurora Veil 20 0 Weakens all attacks, but only usable with hail.
Freezy Frost 15 90 100 Crystal from cold haze hits. Eliminates all stat changes.
Triple Axel 10 20 90 A 3-kick attack that gets more powerful with each hit.
Glacial Lance 5 130 100 Strikes by hurling a blizzard- cloaked icicle lance at foes.
Arctic Terrain 10 0 Boosts Ice-type defenses and power for 5 turns.
Icicle Burst 10 1 100 Retaliates any hit with greater power. May cause frostbite.
Glacial Rift 10 100 100 A fracture that hurts frostbitten battlers more.
Blubber Bump 10 80 100 Does more damage the higher the user's Sp. Def.
Frost Burn 15 85 A chilling burn to inflict a frostbite on the foe.
